name: Zombie Squirt
description:
Play as a priest on the front lines of the zombie apocalypse, and use your wits and holy water from the chapel to melt those abominations before their curse can spread!

Controls:
Movement: WASD or arrow keys
Shoot: Any other key (press a key when prompted and it becomes the shoot key)

History:
I came up with this back in high school because I wanted to make a shooter, but folks were understandably sensitive about that, so I came up with the safest interpretation I could (using a water gun to bring down monsters!) but unfortunately wasn't up to building it. Now, all these years later and with over a decade of experience working in software, I'm getting serious about games again. This is my first solo project for general release, and it seemed like making an old dream a reality would be the perfect way to start.

Localization:
I built this game to be localized but only really speak English. So! If you'd like to see Zombie Squirt in your native language and want to help me translate it, please reach out!
